wsit:client

Full name:

com.github.wsitbt:wsit-maven-plugin:1.0.8-SNAPSHOT:client

Description:

Generates wsit client configuration files.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 1.0.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-resources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
outputdir File 1.0 The configuration files will be written to this directory.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/resources.
wsdl File 1.0 The WSDL to create client configuration for.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
bindingpolicy String 1.0

Required if a policy is set - Specifies the id of the desired policy.

If the is specified and policy is not set, this will be used as the id of the automatically generated policy.
callback Callback 1.0 Optional callback configuration.
certstore Certstore 1.0 Optional certstore configuration
keystore Keystore 1.0 Optional keystore configuration.
outputfile String 1.0 Overrides the output file name.
policy File 1.0 A document containing a Policy definition to be used in the client configuration.
secureconversation SecureConversation 1.0 Optional Secure Conversation configuration.
truststore Truststore 1.0 Optional truststore configuration.

Parameter Details

bindingpolicy:

Required if a policy is set - Specifies the id of the desired policy.

If the is specified and policy is not set, this will be used as the id of the automatically generated policy.

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${wsit-client.bindingpolicy}

callback:

Optional callback configuration.
  • Type: com.appsec.maven.wsit.Callback
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No

certstore:

Optional certstore configuration
  • Type: com.appsec.maven.wsit.Certstore
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No

keystore:

Optional keystore configuration.
  • Type: com.appsec.maven.wsit.Keystore
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No

outputdir:

The configuration files will be written to this directory.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${wsit-client.outputdir}
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/resources

outputfile:

Overrides the output file name.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${wsit-client.outputfile}

policy:

A document containing a Policy definition to be used in the client configuration.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${wsit-client.policy}

secureconversation:

Optional Secure Conversation configuration.
  • Type: com.appsec.wsitbt.core.holders.SecureConversation
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No

truststore:

Optional truststore configuration.
  • Type: com.appsec.maven.wsit.Truststore
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No

wsdl:

The WSDL to create client configuration for.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${wsit-client.wsdl}
